text: Alberto Valdés Lacarra Jr. (30 November 1950 – 19 December 2020) was a Mexican equestrian. He was born in Mexico City. He won a bronze medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow. Valdés Jr. died on 19 December 2020 in Mexico City, aged 70. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican equestrians Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Olympic equestrians Category:Olympic medalists for Mexico Category:Show jumping riders Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Alberto Valdés Jr.
